phrases: I was thinking of switching it out with a new one.
Sorry for making you pick me up.
Do you want to come with us?
Do not worry about it, it was on my way to work.
Are not you going to sit?
I have never been to this area.
We will not have time in our third year to just relax.
And we do not know what to present at Hokubi Festival.
Do not you have any ideas, Nonoka?
But you have not really changed either, Koharu.
You are always pulling Yuzuki forward.
But if that is how you saw me...
I would look grown-up with glasses, too.
Are you done looking at the scenery?
I want to enjoy it more.
Really, Noel and Shione should have come.
I have a prior engagement that day.
She is just making it up.
My stomach, I am going to die!
It is my fault that Monster-san...
I was just messing with you.
All right, I will help you treat him.
We have to wait here for an hour?
I know, but I do not like it.
Did not you say you wanted to savor it?
It is not the same thing.
Maybe there is somewhere we can sit down.
I thought we might need it for when we eat lunch.
I brought all the popular items on the shop's menu.
Oh, you did not make it yourself.
Mom made it, but I was the one who arranged it nicely.
Remember when we all brought our lunches together like this before?
I think Koharu forgot her lunch that time.
But Nonoka asked everyone to share their dishes with me.
and I ended up with the most extravagant lunch.
You are in love, are not you?
Is Monster-san going to get better?
I am sure he is happy that you are so worried for him.
Is there anything I can help with?
Can you hold his arm down so he does not squirm?
Why did not you go with Koharu and the others?
They invited you, did not they?
I cannot see the saucer from afar.
How would you ever leave the town, then?
Come on, hold it down, Noel.
What do you mean, come on?
Could not you say a little more?
How far do we have to walk?
I think we are almost there.
We are going the right way, right?
Yeah, I am using the map.
Fourth row, sixth from the right
I am looking for this landmark,
but I still cannot find it.
I will call Dad and ask.
Do not worry about anything, Nonoka.
She says to leave it to her, so let us do that.
I do not think this is it.
I-It might not be not it.
I think that does it for now.
Is Monster-san going to be okay?
It is still not quite there.
All right, let us bring him back into surgery.
Are we at the right place this time?
Yeah, I think it is here.
In the end, it was all Yuzuki's fault that we got lost.
I will go get some water, so you can take a break.
You are worried about something, are not you?
I forced you to let me come, but do you want to be alone with your mom?
Actually, this whole time, I have been afraid to see Mom.
If you guys had not said you wanted to meet my mom,
I might not have been able to come this far.
I mean, I have only seen her in pictures,
She was nice, and always smiling.
But her hand was always cold.
Seven years ago, right after we moved out of town,
I learned that we moved so that Mom could get treatment.
I was so sad and lonely.
I think that is when I stopped remembering.
I told myself over and over
that none of it ever happened to begin with.
Then I was not miserable anymore.
But I forgot all the important things, too.
Mom would not forgive me the way I am.
She would not be proud of me anymore.
a child that was worth being proud of to begin with.
Then why are you here, Nonoka?
You came here to see your mom, right?
That means you made up your mind to face all of it.
I will not accept any arguments.
I have been proud to be your friend
But can I have just a little more...
Just a little more time, please.
We will be waiting over there.
Is it already that time of the year?
It is coming down pretty hard.
It is you, is not it?
Why do not you talk to her again like way back when?
Togawa-san, we are all going stargazing at the lake tonight.
It was Mom who gave me an opportunity to be friends with Shione.
If you really want to be her friend...
Do not look like that, then.
I remember you smiling all the time.
I think your mom would like to see your smile, too.
I wonder if Monster-san is going to be happy.
Yeah, I bet he is thankful to you.
And Koharu will not be sad, either.
Koharu will not change him with another Monster-san now, right?
That is how much she likes it.
Can I ask you something, Yuzuki, Souta?
Yuzuki did the draft drawing, I cut boards and stuff,
and we painted it with Koharu.
Your smile pushed me forward a lot of times.
you took what your mom told you to heart, right?
I am here to see you.
She is probably there with you about now.
Sorry I could not be there.
I decided to let Nonoka go instead this year.
He could not make it this year because of work.
We will catch up to you.
It might not be exactly the same, but
I said it is fine, does it matter?
I am the poster girl, after all.
Not just yet, but we will see a lot of shooting stars on that night.
Would you like to see, too, Shione-chan?
Are shooting stars even more sparkly?
Let us watch together when it comes.
The stars are watching you, too.
It is like they are smiling.
It must be because you are both smiling.
Shione told me to tell you, Nonoka.
That she wanted to watch the meteor shower with you.
I wanted to watch the meteor shower with her.
